plugin.name: speedwalk_manager_p2
plugin.author: Ruthgul
plugin.purpose: speedwalk manager part 2, handles command line speedwalks
plugin.description:
.------------------------. | speedwalk_manager_p2 | `------------------------'
It evaluates a speewalk and sends it to the MUD, 1 direction at a time (so, it moves you at ~ping speed).
** REQUIRES **
- MM_GMCP_Handler (plugin id="f67c4339ed0591a5b010d05b") must be installed and enabled. - MM_GMCP_Mapper_GMCP (plugin id="f973af093e715dece34dc25f") must be installed an enabled to use the 'gate' command. - Client setting: Game, Configure, Output > [x] Convert IAC EOR/GA to new line (must be checked).
Syntax:
* spd2 <speedwalk> - runs a speedwalk, if it's valid (eg, spd2 3(ne)3s3w )
* spd2 abort - cancels a speedwalk
* gate <place> - shows room GMCP number for a place's gate (to be used with mapper goto, once you have all roads mapped) (Note that the % symbol can be used as a wildcard.)
* dock {<ship_name>|<place_name>} - shows room GMCP number for a public ship's docks (to be used with mapper goto, once you have piers mapped) (Note that the % symbol can be used as a wildcard.)
* spdn <abbreviation or place> - tries to run to <abbreviation> (eg, spdn NRN), or lists abbreviations matching the place (eg, spdn New Rigel) (Note that, when searching for a place, the % symbol can be used as a wildcard.)
* spdn all - lists all of the available paths and their abbreviations
* add abbreviation <name> <room_id> <description> - adds a new abbreviation to the database, where <name> cannot contain spaces, and <room_id> must be a valid GMCP room id (eg, add abbreviation TemTS 46670 Templeton Town Square)
* del abbreviation <name> - removes an abbreviation from the database (eg, del abbreviation TemTS); where <name> is case sensitive
Author: Ruthgul
Latest version: http://github.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts

muclient.script:
require "gmcphelper"
----------------- -- plugin stuff -----------------
function OnPluginInstall() Tell("-- " .. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID (), 1) .. ": type ") ColourTell("silver", "black", GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID (), 1) .. " help") Note(" to see the list of available commands --")
-- open database on disk local path = GetInfo(66) local filename = "spdman2_locations.db"
local res = 0
if (not file_exists(path .. filename)) then local res = get_database(path, filename)
if (res ~= 0) then Note("-- " .. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1) .. ": error downloading database --") end end
if (res == 0) then db = assert(sqlite3.open(path .. filename)) end end
function OnHelp() ColourNote("silver", "black", world.GetPluginInfo(world.GetPluginID (), 3)) Note("") ColourNote("silver", "black", "(this version: " .. os.date("%c", GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID(), 14)) .. ")") end
function plugin_update_url() local t = { "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts/master/src/speedwalk_manager_gmcp_p2.xml", } return (table.concat(t, ";")) end
------------------- -- database stuff -------------------
function dbcheck(code) if code ~= sqlite3.OK and -- no error code ~= sqlite3.ROW and -- completed OK with another row of data code ~= sqlite3.DONE then -- completed OK, no more rows local err = db:errmsg() -- the rollback will change the error message db:exec("ROLLBACK") -- rollback any transaction to unlock the database error(err, 2) -- show error in caller's context end end
function fixsql(s) if s then return "'" .. (string.gsub(s, "'", "''")) .. "'" -- replace single quotes with two lots of single quotes else return "NULL" end end
function file_exists(path) local f = io.open(path, "r")
if (f) then io.close(f) return true
else return false end end
---------------------------- -- download database stuff ----------------------------
function get_database(path, filename) Note("-- " .. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1) .. ": downloading database --")
local res = 0 local url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts/master/src/" .. filename
SetStatus ("Downloading file: " .. url .. " to: " .. path .. filename .. "...")
res = res + download_file(url, path .. filename)
SetStatus ("Ready") return res end
function download_file(url, lpath) local http = require "socket.http" local file, res, header file, res, header = http.request(url) if (res ~= 200) then Note("error accessing " .. url .. " - code: " .. res) return -1 end
res = save_file(lpath, file) return res end
function save_file(lpath, file) local f, res, rescode
-- (re)create the file f, res, rescode = io.open(lpath, "wb") if (f == nil) then Note("error creating file: " .. res .. " - code: " .. rescode) return -1 end
-- save the contents f:write(file) f:flush() f:close()
return 0 end
--------------- -- GMCP stuff ---------------
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if (id =="f67c4339ed0591a5b010d05b") then -- GMCP message if (text == "room.info") then -- room.info if (speeding) then -- are we speedwalking? get_gmcp_room()
if (ignore_next_room == 0) then -- we actually moved speed_step() end
if (ignore_next_room > 0) then ignore_next_room = ignore_next_room - 1 end end end end end
function get_gmcp_room() local res, gmcparg = CallPlugin("f67c4339ed0591a5b010d05b", "gmcpval", "room.info") luastmt = "gmcpdata = " .. gmcparg
assert(loadstring(luastmt or ""))() end
--------------------- -- speedwalks stuff ---------------------
speeding = nil starttime = nil speedwalk_steps = nil current_step = nil last_step_time = nil last_step_timeout = nil last_command = nil ignore_next_room = 0 combat = nil
function wipe_vars() speeding = nil spdpause = nil starttime = nil speedwalk_steps = nil current_step = nil last_step_time = nil last_step_timeout = nil last_command = nil ignore_next_room = 0 combat = nil ResetTimer("spd_step_check") EnableTimer("spd_step_check", false) end
function on_fear() if (speeding) then ignore_next_room = ignore_next_room + 1 end end
function obstacle_found() if (speeding) then Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: error - found an obstacle in the speedwalk --") speedwalk_abort() end end
function speedwalk_start(spdeval) speeding = true spdpause = nil
spdeval = string.gsub(spdeval, "\r\n", ";")
speedwalk_steps = utils.split(spdeval, ";") current_step = 1 EnableTimer("spd_step_check", true) speed_step() -- start moving end
function speedwalk_c(name, line, wildcards) local cmd = wildcards.command if (cmd == "abort") then speedwalk_abort() else speedwalk(cmd) end end
function speedwalk(wildcards) local speedwalk_eval = EvaluateSpeedwalk(wildcards)
local firstdir = string.sub(speedwalk_eval, 1, 1) if (firstdir == "*") then -- it's not a "valid" speedwalk Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: error - speedwalk contains invalid directions --")
else -- it's an ok "immediate" (passed-by-paramater) speedwalk free_walk = nil starttime = os.time() speedwalk_start(speedwalk_eval) end end
function speedwalk_abort() if (speeding ~= nil) then Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: speedwalk aborted - elapsed time " .. os.time() - starttime .. "s --") wipe_vars() end end
function on_combat() combat = true end
function speed_step_repeat_last(how) if (speeding) then if (how == "open") then Send("open " .. last_command .. " door") opened = true
else if (opened) then opened = nil elseif (combat) then combat = nil end
Send(last_command) end last_step_time = os.time() end end
function speed_step_check_action() if (last_step_timeout) then if ((combat) or (opened)) then speed_step_repeat_last() -- try to repeat the last step else Send("look") end last_step_timeout = nil end end
function speed_step_check() if (speeding) then if ((os.time() - last_step_time) > 1) then -- more than 1 second has passed since the previous step last_step_timeout = true speed_step_check_action() end end end
function speed_step() if (speeding) then local next = speedwalk_steps[current_step] if (next ~= "") then last_command = next Send(last_command) last_step_time = os.time() current_step = current_step + 1
else -- speedwalk is done Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: done - elapsed time " .. os.time() - starttime .. "s --") wipe_vars() end end end
---------------- -- gates stuff ----------------
function show_roomids_areas(name, line, wildcards) local place = wildcards.place show_roomids(place, "areas") end
function show_roomids_docks(name, line, wildcards) local place = wildcards.place show_roomids(place, "docks") end
function show_roomids(place, what) if (db) then local plane = get_gmcp_plane()
local tuids = find_matching_places(what, plane, place)
show_matching_places(tuids, what, plane, place)
else ColourNote("tomato", "black", "-- speedwalk_manager_p2: no database - please reinstall the plugin --") end end
function get_gmcp_plane() local plane
if (gmcpdata) then plane = gmcpval("coord.name") end
-- quick & dirty fix for Rune Graveyard & other similar places if (not plane) or (plane == "_empty") then plane = "Alyria" end
return plane end
function find_matching_places(what, plane, place) what = fixsql(what) plane = fixsql(plane) place = fixsql("%" .. string.upper(place) .. "%")
local tuids = {}
-- build table of places that match for row in db:nrows(string.format("SELECT uid, desc FROM locations WHERE type = %s AND plane = %s AND UPPER(desc) like %s", what, plane, place)) do tuids[#tuids + 1] = row.desc .. "Ø" .. row.uid end -- finding rooms
-- sort it alphabetically table.sort(tuids)
return tuids end
function show_matching_places(tuids, what, plane, place) local t
local label if (what == "areas") then label = "area: " elseif (what == "docks") then label = "dock: " end
Note("-- speedwalk manager: results for '" .. place .. "' in " .. plane .. ": --")
if (#tuids > 0) then for i = 1, #tuids do t = utils.split(tuids[i], "Ø") Tell(label) Hyperlink("mapper goto " .. t[2], t[1], "", "white", "black", false) Tell(" - id: ") ColourNote("silver", "black", t[2]) end
Note("Click on an area's name or type 'mapper goto <id>' to speedwalk to the place, if possible.")
else Note("no matches") end end
--------- -- spdn ---------
function walk_or_find_c(name, line, wildcards) local place = wildcards.place
walk_or_find(place) end
function walk_or_find(place) if (db) then local tuids = find_exact_match(place)
if (#tuids == 1) then Execute("mapper goto " .. tuids[1])
else tuids = find_by_desc(place)
show_results(tuids, place) end
else ColourNote("tomato", "black", "-- speedwalk_manager_p2: no database - please reinstall the plugin --") end end
function find_exact_match(place) local place = fixsql(string.upper(place))
local tuids = {}
-- build table of places that match for row in db:nrows(string.format("SELECT uid FROM locations WHERE UPPER(shortcut) = %s", place)) do tuids[#tuids + 1] = row.uid end -- finding rooms
return tuids end
function find_by_desc(place) local place = fixsql("%" .. string.upper(place) .. "%")
local tuids = {}
-- build table of places that match for row in db:nrows(string.format("SELECT desc, shortcut FROM locations WHERE UPPER(desc) like %s", place)) do tuids[#tuids + 1] = row.desc .. "Ø" .. row.shortcut end -- finding rooms
-- sort it alphabetically table.sort(tuids)
return tuids end
function show_results(tuids, place) local t
Note("-- speedwalk manager: abbreviations matching '" .. place .. "': --")
if (#tuids > 0) then for i = 1, #tuids do t = utils.split(tuids[i], "Ø") ColourNote("silver", "black", t[2] .. " - " .. t[1]) end
Note("type 'spdn <abbreviation>' to speedwalk to the place, if possible.")
else Note("no matches") end end
------------------------------------ -- adding / removing abbreviations ------------------------------------
function add_abbreviation(name, line, wildcards) local name = wildcards.name local num = wildcards.id local desc = wildcards.desc
if (db) then db_save_location("other", "?", num, desc, name) else ColourNote("tomato", "black", "-- speedwalk_manager_p2: no database - please reinstall the plugin --") end end
function del_abbreviation(name, line, wildcards) local name = wildcards.name
if (db) then db_delete_location(name) else ColourNote("tomato", "black", "-- speedwalk_manager_p2: no database - please reinstall the plugin --") end end
-------------------------- -- database tables stuff --------------------------
function db_save_location(type, plane, uid, desc, shortcut) local location = load_location_from_database(shortcut)
if (not location) then save_location_to_database(type, plane, uid, desc, shortcut)
else update_location_database_info(type, plane, uid, desc, shortcut) end end
function load_location_from_database(shortcut) local location
for row in db:nrows(string.format("SELECT * FROM locations WHERE shortcut = %s", fixsql(shortcut))) do location = { type = row.type, plane = row.plane, uid = row.uid, desc = row.desc, shortcut = row.shortcut, } end
return location end
function save_location_to_database(type, plane, uid, desc, shortcut) db:exec("BEGIN TRANSACTION;")
dbcheck(db:execute(string.format( "INSERT INTO locations(type, plane, uid, desc, shortcut, date_added) VALUES(%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, DATETIME('NOW'));", fixsql(type), fixsql(plane), fixsql(uid), fixsql(desc), fixsql(shortcut) )))
db:exec("COMMIT;")
Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: added abbreviation " .. shortcut .. " to the db --") end
function update_location_database_info(type, plane, uid, desc, shortcut) db:exec("BEGIN TRANSACTION;")
dbcheck(db:execute(string.format( "UPDATE locations SET type = %s, plane = %s, uid = %s, desc = %s, date_added = DATETIME('NOW') WHERE shortcut = %s;", fixsql(type), fixsql(plane), fixsql(uid), fixsql(desc), fixsql(shortcut) )))
db:exec("COMMIT;")
Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: updated db info for abbreviation " .. shortcut .. " --") end
function db_delete_location(shortcut) local location = load_location_from_database(shortcut)
if (location) then delete_location_from_database(shortcut) end end
function delete_location_from_database(shortcut) db:exec("BEGIN TRANSACTION;")
dbcheck(db:execute(string.format([[ DELETE FROM locations WHERE shortcut = %s; ]], fixsql(shortcut) )))
db:exec("COMMIT;")
Note("-- speedwalk_manager_p2: removed abbreviation " .. shortcut .. " from the db --") end
